enhanced_description: Infosys BPM offers end-to-end transformative business process management (BPM) services globally, integrating IT and BPM solutions to unlock business value and address diverse business challenges. As a global leader in next-generation BPM services, they focus on reimagining business processes to help organizations navigate their future. Their approach includes energizing the core with digital frameworks to deliver design-led experiences for customer delight, leveraging new technologies for agile digital at scale to enhance business performance, and fostering always-on learning by reskilling the workforce using digital platforms. With over 20 years of experience, a workforce of 57,000+ professionals across 111 nationalities, and 45 delivery locations in 16 countries, Infosys BPM demonstrates significant global scale and expertise.
